content: द्रविडः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country on the east coast of the Deccan (<ab>pl.</ab>); अस्ति द्रविडेषु कांची नाम नगरी <ls>Dk. 130.</ls> {@--2@} An inhabitant or native of that country; जरद्द्रविडधार्मिकस्येच्छया निसृष्टैः <ls>K. 229.</ls> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a degraded tribe; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 10. 22.</ls>

द्रविड <ab>N.</ab> of a country to the south of the wild tract between the Kṛṣṇā and the Polar. In its larger sense it included the whole of the Coromandel coast to the south of the Godāvarī. But in its strict sense it must not have extended beyond the Kāverī. Its capital was Kāñcī, the same as Conjeveram situated on the Vegavatī river 42 miles south-west of Madras.
